job_tasks.phrase: Je onderzoekt en ontwikkelt AI-modellen die onze dienstverlening slimmer en efficiënter maken.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the research and development of AI models, which is the core of the Modeling task.
Optimization of an AI-driven system implies working with and improving AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: experimenteer je met generatieve AI om klantvragen sneller en gemakkelijker te beantwoorden en waardevolle inzichten te genereren.
job_tasks.justification: Experimenting with generative AI for answering customer queries and generating insights falls under advanced modeling techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Je implementeert en test nieuwe algoritmen die data-analyse versnellen en verbeteren
job_tasks.justification: Implementing and testing new algorithms for data analysis directly relates to the modeling process.
Integrating AI solutions into existing systems is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: zodat onze klanten beter en sneller de juiste (strategische) beslissingen kunnen nemen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the goal of enabling customers to make strategic decisions, indicating a need to understand business context and impact.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met onze data-experts en softwareontwikkelaars
job_tasks.justification: Working closely with other experts is a clear indicator of collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: presenteer je je bevindingen en aanbevelingen aan het team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting findings and recommendations to the team is a communication task.

job_tasks.phrase: Jouw frisse blik en technische kennis dragen bij aan de verdere ontwikkeling van ons platform.
job_tasks.justification: Bringing a fresh perspective and technical knowledge to platform development implies problem-solving and contributing to solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met onze data-experts en softwareontwikkelaars
presenteer je je bevindingen en aanbevelingen aan het team
Jouw frisse blik en technische kennis dragen bij aan de verdere ontwikkeling van ons platform.
krijg je de kans om diep in de wereld van AI te duiken

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes research and development of AI models, specifically mentioning generative AI for customer queries and insights. It also highlights integrating these models into systems, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on building applications with generative models.
